long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brilliant design ideas look absolutely amazing with a professional typeface system.

The most important thing is the typographic system at any design category whether it is a graphic design or web design. If your typographic system is solid then your design will look perfect. This add-on enables you to create your own typographic system and adopt it to your design.
